title: Deals: Hisense U8G 120Hz Android TVs $250 off, TP-Link Assistant gear from $10, more
content:
All of today’s best deals kick off with the $250 in savings on Hisense 2021 U8G ULED 120Hz Android TVs. That’s alongside Assistant-enabled TP-Link Kasa gear on sale from $10 and a Samsung EVO Select 128GB microSD card at $16. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch.

more…

The post Deals: Hisense U8G 120Hz Android TVs $250 off, TP-Link Assistant gear from $10, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Equipped with 120Hz panels and a HDMI 2.1 port, the Hisense U8G Android TV lineup is now $250 off alongside other deals today.
